If this damage kills a creature, the creature's soul rises from the River Styx as a lemure in Avernus in 1d4 hours. If the creature isn't revived before then, only a wish spell or killing the lemure and casting true resurrection on the creature's original body can restore it to life. Constructs and devils are immune to this effect.

actions.name: Infernal Command
actions.desc: Each ally of the narzugon within 60 feet of it can't be charmed or frightened until the end of the narzugon's next turn.

actions.name: Terrifying Command
actions.desc: Each creature that isn't a fiend within 60 feet of the narzugon that can hear it must succeed on a 17 Charisma saving throw or become frightened of it for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that makes a successful saving throw is immune to this narzugon's Terrifying Command for 24 hours.

actions.name: Healing (1/Day)
actions.desc: The narzugon, or one creature it touches, regains up to 100 hit points.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.desc: The mastiff has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Pounce
traits.desc: If the deinonychus moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the deinonychus can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The deinonychus makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The merrow can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The merrow makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or harpoon.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Harpoon
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it must succeed on a Strength contest against the merrow or be pulled up to 20 feet toward the merrow.

monsters.name: The Lonely
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing while in dim light or darkness

traits.name: Psychic Leech
traits.desc: At the start of each of the Lonely's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

traits.name: Thrives on Company
traits.desc: The Lonely has advantage on attack rolls while it is within 30 feet of at least two other creatures. It otherwise has disadvantage on attack rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Lonely makes one harpoon arm attack and uses Sorrowful Embrace.

actions.name: Harpoon Arm
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 60 ft., one target. 21 (4d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape 15) if it is a Large or smaller creature. The Lonely has two harpoon arms and can grapple up to two creatures at once.

actions.name: Sorrowful Embrace
actions.desc: Each creature grappled by the Lonely must make a 15 Wisdom saving throw. A creature takes 18 (4d8) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. In either case, the Lonely pulls each creature grappled by it up to 30 feet straight toward it.

monsters.name: Geryon
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Geryon fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Geryon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Geryon's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Geryon regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Geryon dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Geryon makes two attacks: one with his claws and one with his stinger.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 23 (4d6 + 9) slashing damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is grappled (24) and is restrained until the grapple ends. Geryon can grapple one creature at a time. If the target is already grappled by Geryon, the target takes an extra 27 (6d8) slashing damage.

actions.name: Stinger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 20 ft., one creature. 14 (2d4 + 9) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 21 Constitution saving throw or take 13 (2d12) poison damage and become poisoned until it finishes a short or long rest. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to half the poison damage it takes. If its hit point maximum drops to 0, it dies. This reduction lasts until the poisoned condition is removed.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: Geryon magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary_actions.name: Infernal Glare
legendary_actions.desc: Geryon targets one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. If the target can see Geryon, the target must succeed on a 23 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of Geryon until the end of its next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Swift Sting (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Geryon attacks with his stinger.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: Geryon uses his Teleport action.

spells: Geryon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 21). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: alter self (can become Medium when changing his appearance), detect magic, geas, ice storm, invisibility (self only), locate object, suggestion, wall of ice
1/day each: divine word, symbol (pain only)

monsters.name: Fraz-Urb'luu
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing that is nonmagical
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Fraz-Urb'luu fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

actions.desc: Fraz-Urb'luu makes three attacks: one with his bite and two with his fists.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (3d6 + 9) piercing damage.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 22 (3d8 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

The grappled target is also restrained. Fraz-Urb'luu can grapple only one creature with his tail at a time.

legendary_actions.name: Phantasmal Killer (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Fraz-Urb'luu casts phantasmal killer, no concentration required.

spells: Fraz-Urb'luu's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 23). Fraz-Urb'luu can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: alter self (can become Medium when changing his appearance), detect magic, dispel magic, phantasmal force
3/day each: confusion, dream, mislead, programmed illusion, seeming
1/day each: mirage arcane, modify memory, project image

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (2d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Flesh Golem
monsters.damage_immunities: lightning, poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Berserk
traits.desc: Whenever the golem starts its turn with 40 hit points or fewer, roll a d6. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points. The golem's creator, if within 60 feet of the berserk golem, can try to calm it by speaking firmly and persuasively. The golem must be able to hear its creator, who must take an action to make a 15 Charisma (Persuasion) check. If the check succeeds, the golem ceases being berserk. If it takes damage while still at 40 hit points or fewer, the golem might go berserk again.

traits.name: Aversion of Fire
traits.desc: If the golem takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Lightning Absorption
traits.desc: Whenever the golem is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The golem makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Booyahg Slave of the Archfey

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.desc: The goblin can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Misty Escape (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
reactions.desc: In response to taking damage, the goblin turns invisible and teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. It remains invisible until the start of its next turn or until it attacks, makes a damage roll, or casts a spell.

spells: The goblin's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells (spell save 15), requiring no material components:
Cantrips (at will): dancing lights, eldritch blast, friends, mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, vicious mockery
5th level (3 slots): blink, charm person, dimension door, dominate beast, faerie fire, fear, hold monster, misty step, phantasmal force, seeming, sleep
At will: disguise self, mage armor (self only), silent image, speak with animals
1/day each: conjure fey

traits.name: Hold Breath

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target not grappled by the crocodile. 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

traits.desc: The hyena has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hyena's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Bite

monsters.name: Nilbog

traits.desc: Any creature that attempts to damage the nilbog must first succeed on a 12 Charisma saving throw or be charmed until the end of the creature's next turn. A creature charmed in this way must use its action praising the nilbog. The nilbog can't regain hit points, including through magical healing, except through its Reversal of Fortune reaction.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.desc: The nilbog can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Fool's Scepter
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Reversal of Fortune
reactions.desc: In response to another creature dealing damage to the nilbog, the nilbog reduces the damage to 0 and regains 1d6 hit points.

spells: The nilbog's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 12). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: mage hand, Tasha's hideous laughter, vicious mockery
1/day each: confusion

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 26 (6d6 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 20 (3d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The satyr has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

monsters.damage_resistances: lightning, piercing

traits.desc: The thorny has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring plant life.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The thorny regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes cold, fire, or necrotic damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the thorny's next turn. The thorny dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Thorny Body
traits.desc: At the start of its turn, the thorny deals 2 (1d4) piercing damage to any creature grappling it.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (2d6 + 1) piercing damage.

traits.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
traits.desc: The champion rerolls a failed saving throw.

traits.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the champion can regain 20 hit points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The champion makes three attacks with its greatsword or its shortbow.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage, plus 7 (2d6) slashing damage if the champion has more than half of its total hit points remaining.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, plus 7 (2d6) piercing damage if the champion has more than half of its total hit points remaining.

monsters.name: Shield Guardian
monsters.senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 10
monsters.languages: understands commands given in any language but can't speak

traits.name: Bound
traits.desc: The shield guardian is magically bound to an amulet. As long as the guardian and its amulet are on the same plane of existence, the amulet's wearer can telepathically call the guardian to travel to it, and the guardian knows the distance and direction to the amulet. If the guardian is within 60 feet of the amulet's wearer, half of any damage the wearer takes (rounded up) is transferred to the guardian.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The shield guardian regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

traits.name: Spell Storing
traits.desc: A spellcaster who wears the shield guardian's amulet can cause the guardian to store one spell of 4th level or lower. To do so, the wearer must cast the spell on the guardian. The spell has no effect but is stored within the guardian. When commanded to do so by the wearer or when a situation arises that was predefined by the spellcaster, the guardian casts the stored spell with any parameters set by the original caster, requiring no components. When the spell is cast or a new spell is stored, any previously stored spell is lost.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The guardian makes two fist attacks.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

reactions.name: Shield
reactions.desc: When a creature makes an attack against the wearer of the guardian's amulet, the guardian grants a +2 bonus to the wearer's AC if the guardian is within 5 feet of the wearer.

monsters.languages: Giant Eagle, understands Common and Auran but can't speak them

traits.name: Keen Sight
traits.desc: The eagle has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Hydroloth
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 14

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The hydroloth can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The hydroloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The hydroloth's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Secure Memory
traits.desc: The hydroloth is immune to the waters of the River Styx as well as any effect that would steal or modify its memories or detect or read its thoughts.

traits.name: Watery Advantage
traits.desc: While submerged in liquid, the hydroloth has advantage on attack rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hydroloth makes two melee attacks. In place of one of these attacks, it can cast one spell that takes 1 action to cast.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Steal Memory (1/Day)
actions.desc: The hydroloth targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target takes 4d6 psychic damage, and it must make a 16 Intelligence saving throw. On a successful save, the target becomes immune to this hydroloth's Steal Memory for 24 hours. On a failed save, the target loses all proficiencies, it can't cast spells, it can't understand language, and if its Intelligence and Charisma scores are higher than 5, they become 5. Each time the target finishes a long rest, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. A greater restoration or remove curse spell cast on the target ends this effect early.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: The hydroloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spells: The hydroloth's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 16). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: darkness, detect magic, dispel magic, invisibility (self only), water walk
3/day each: control water, crown of madness, fear, phantasmal killer, suggestion

traits.name: Rampage
traits.desc: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The gnoll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or take 7 (2d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Blood Drain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the stirge attaches to the target. While attached, the stirge doesn't attack. Instead, at the start of each of the stirge's turns, the target loses 5 (1d4 + 3) hit points due to blood loss. The stirge can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. It does so after it drains 10 hit points of blood from the target or the target dies. A creature, including the target, can use its action to detach the stirge.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The pteranodon doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (2d4 + 1) piercing damage

traits.desc: The soul monger has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The soul monger has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.desc: When the soul monger reduces a creature to 0 hit points, the soul monger can gain temporary hit points equal to half the creature's hit point maximum. While the soul monger has temporary hit points from this ability, it has advantage on attack rolls.

traits.name: Weight of Ages
traits.desc: Any beast or humanoid, other than a shadar-kai, that starts its turn within 5 feet of the soul monger has its speed reduced by 20 feet until the start of that creature's next turn.

actions.desc: The soul monger emits weariness in a 60-foot cube. Each creature in that area must make a 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 45 (10d8) psychic damage and suffers 1 level of exhaustion. On a successful save, it takes 22 (5d8) psychic damage.

spells: The soul monger's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: chill touch, poison spray
1/day each: bestow curse, chain lightning, finger of death, gaseous form, phantasmal killer, seeming

monsters.name: Tarrasque
monsters.damage_immunities: fire, poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the tarrasque fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The tarrasque has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Reflective Carapace
traits.desc: Any time the tarrasque is targeted by a magic missile spell, a line spell, or a spell that requires a ranged attack roll, roll a d6. On a 1 to 5, the tarrasque is unaffected. On a 6, the tarrasque is unaffected, and the effect is reflected back at the caster as though it originated from the tarrasque, turning the caster into the target.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The tarrasque deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tarrasque can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes five attacks: one with its bite, two with its claws, one with its horns, and one with its tail. It can use its Swallow instead of its bite.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +19 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 36 (4d12 + 10) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape 20). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the tarrasque can't bite another target.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +19 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 28 (4d8 + 10) slashing damage.

actions.name: Horns
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +19 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 32 (4d10 + 10) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +19 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 24 (4d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 20 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of the tarrasque's choice within 120 feet of it and aware of it must succeed on a 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the tarrasque is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the tarrasque's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.desc: The tarrasque makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target takes the bite's damage, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the tarrasque, and it takes 56 (16d6) acid damage at the start of each of the tarrasque's turns. If the tarrasque takes 60 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the tarrasque must succeed on a 20 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the tarrasque. If the tarrasque dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 30 feet of movement, exiting prone.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The tarrasque makes one claw attack or tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: The tarrasque moves up to half its speed.

legendary_actions.name: Chomp (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The tarrasque makes one bite attack or uses its Swallow.

monsters.name: Needle Blight
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 9

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (2d4 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Needles
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. 8 (2d6 + 1) piercing damage.

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the elk moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Ram
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. 8 (2d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the minotaur moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 14 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked prone.

traits.name: Labyrinthine Recall
traits.desc: The minotaur can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

traits.name: Reckless
traits.desc: At the start of its turn, the minotaur can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (2d12 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Ancient Black Dragon
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 26

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 19 (2d10 + 8) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) acid damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 15 (2d6 + 8) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 17 (2d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a 19 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales acid in a 90-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a 22 Dexterity saving throw, taking 67 (15d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Detect
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a 23 Dexterity saving throw or take 15 (2d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the roper remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal cave formation, such as a stalagmite.

traits.name: Grasping Tendrils
traits.desc: The roper can have up to six tendrils at a time. Each tendril can be attacked (AC 20; 10 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage). Destroying a tendril deals no damage to the roper, which can extrude a replacement tendril on its next turn. A tendril can also be broken if a creature takes an action and succeeds on a 15 Strength check against it.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The roper can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The roper makes four attacks with its tendrils, uses Reel, and makes one attack with its bite.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 22 (4d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tendril
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 50 ft., one creature. The target is grappled (escape 15). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained and has disadvantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws, and the roper can't use the same tendril on another target.

actions.name: Reel
actions.desc: The roper pulls each creature grappled by it up to 25 feet straight toward it.

monsters.name: Deep Rothé

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the rothé moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

spells: The deep rothé's spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast dancing lights at will, requiring no components.
At will: dancing lights

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the sea horse moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.desc: The sea horse can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Ram
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Canoloth
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.senses: darkvision 60 ft., truesight 120 ft., passive Perception 19

traits.name: Dimensional Lock
traits.desc: Other creatures can't teleport to or from a space within 60 feet of the canoloth. Any attempt to do so is wasted.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The canoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The canoloth's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Uncanny Senses
traits.desc: The canoloth can't be {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised} while it isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 25 (6d6 + 4) piercing damage.

If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape 15), pulled up to 30 feet toward the canoloth, and is restrained until the grapple ends. The canoloth can grapple one target at a time with its tongue.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The steeder can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Extraordinary Leap
traits.desc: The distance of the steeder's long jumps is tripled; every foot of its walking speed that it spends on the jump allows it to move 3 feet.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage.

actions.name: Sticky Leg
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. The target is stuck to the steeder's leg and is grappled until it escapes (escape 12). The steeder can have only one creature grappled at a time.

traits.name: Keen Sight and Smell
traits.desc: The owlbear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Martial Fury
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the sword wraith can make one weapon attack, which deals an extra 9 (2d8) necrotic damage on a hit. If it does so, attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

traits.name: Turning Defiance
traits.desc: The sword wraith and any other sword wraiths within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sword wraith makes two weapon attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.desc: To use this action, the sword wraith must have taken damage during the current combat. If the sword wraith can use this action, it gives itself advantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn, and 1d4 + 1 sword wraith warrior|mtf|sword wraith warriors appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of it. The warriors last until they drop to 0 hit points, and they take their turns immediately after the commander's turn on the same initiative count.

monsters.name: Sahuagin Priestess

traits.name: Blood Frenzy
traits.desc: The sahuagin has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

traits.name: Limited Amphibiousness
traits.desc: The sahuagin can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

traits.name: Shark Telepathy
traits.desc: The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sahuagin makes two melee attacks: one with her bite and one with her claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage.

spells: The sahuagin is a 6th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): guidance, thaumaturgy
1st level (4 slots): bless, detect magic, guiding bolt
2nd level (3 slots): hold person, spiritual weapon (trident)
3rd level (3 slots): mass healing word, tongues

monsters.name: Cloud Giant

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The giant has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 21 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage.

actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +12 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

At will: detect magic, fog cloud, light
3/day each: feather fall, fly, misty step, telekinesis
1/day each: control weather, gaseous form

monsters.name: Dire Troll
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.desc: The troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell or sight.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, it regains only 5 hit points at the start of its next turn. The troll dies only if it is hit by an attack that deals 10 or more acid or fire damage while the troll has 0 hit points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The troll makes five attacks: one with its bite and four with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 10 (1d8 + 6) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) poison damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 16 (3d6 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.desc: Each creature within 10 feet of the troll must make a 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Yeth Hound
monsters.damage_immunities: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons
monsters.languages: understands Common, Elvish, and Sylvan but can't speak

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.desc: The yeth hound has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

traits.name: Sunlight Banishment
traits.desc: If the yeth hound starts its turn in sunlight, it is transported to the Ethereal Plane. While sunlight shines on the spot from which it vanished, the hound must remain in the Deep Ethereal. After sunset, it returns to the Border Ethereal at the same spot, whereupon it typically sets out to find its pack or its master. The hound is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, but it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane. Once it is adjacent to its master or a pack mate that is on the Material Plane, a yeth hound in the Border Ethereal can return to the Material Plane as an action.

traits.name: Telepathic Bond
traits.desc: While the yeth hound is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically with each other.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, plus 14 (4d6) psychic damage if the target is frightened.

actions.name: Baleful Baying
actions.desc: The yeth hound bays magically. Every enemy within 300 feet of the hound that can hear it must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of the hound's next turn or until the hound is incapacitated. A frightened target that starts its turn within 30 feet of the hound must use all its movement on that turn to get as far from the hound as possible, must finish the move before taking an action, and must take the most direct route, even if hazards lie that way. A target that successfully saves is immune to the baying of all yeth hounds for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Stone Cursed
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Cunning Opportunist
traits.desc: The stone cursed has advantage on the attack rolls of opportunity attacks.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the stone cursed remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal statue.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage, or 14 (2d10 + 3) slashing damage if the attack roll had advantage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw, or it begins to turn to stone and is restrained until the end of its next turn, when it must repeat the saving throw. The effect ends if the second save is successful; otherwise the target is petrified for 24 hours.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 piercing damage, and the target must make a 10 Constitution saving throw, taking 5 (2d4) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Pseudodragon
monsters.senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 13
monsters.languages: understands Common and Draconic but can't speak

traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.desc: The pseudodragon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight, hearing, or smell.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The pseudodragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Limited Telepathy
traits.desc: The pseudodragon can magically communicate simple ideas, emotions, and images telepathically with any creature within 100 feet of it that can understand a language.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Sting
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 11 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target falls unconscious for the same duration, or until it takes damage or another creature uses an action to shake it awake.

monsters.name: Pixie

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The pixie has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Superior Invisibility
actions.desc: The pixie magically turns invisible until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the pixie wears or carries is invisible with it.

spells: The pixie's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 12). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring only its pixie dust as a component:
At will: druidcraft
1/day each: confusion, dancing lights, detect evil and good, detect thoughts, dispel magic, entangle, fly, phantasmal force, polymorph, sleep

traits.name: Keen Sight
traits.desc: The hawk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The hawk has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hawk's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Mental Fortitude
traits.desc: The neogi has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened, and magic can't put the neogi to sleep.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The neogi can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The neogi makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Enslave (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: The neogi targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed by the neogi for 1 day, or until the neogi dies or is more than 1 mile from the target. The charmed target obeys the neogi's commands and can't take reactions, and the neogi and the target can communicate telepathically with each other at a distance of up to 1 mile. Whenever the charmed target takes damage, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.desc: The jackal has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The jackal has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the jackal's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 (1d4 - 1) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Bard

traits.name: Song of Rest
traits.desc: The bard can perform a song while taking a short rest. Any ally who hears the song regains an extra 1d6 hit points if it spends any Hit Dice to regain hit points at the end of that rest. The bard can confer this benefit on itself as well.

traits.name: Taunt (2/Day)
traits.desc: The bard can use a bonus action on its turn to target one creature within 30 feet of it. If the target can hear the bard, the target must succeed on a 12 Charisma saving throw or have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws until the start of the bard's next turn.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: The bard is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following bard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): friends, mage hand, vicious mockery
1st level (4 slots): charm person, healing word, heroism, sleep, thunderwave
2nd level (3 slots): invisibility, shatter

traits.name: Mental Resistance
traits.desc: The broodguard has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't paralyze it.

traits.name: Reckless
traits.desc: At the start of its turn, the broodguard can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The broodguard makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

traits.name: Fear Aura
traits.desc: Any beast or humanoid that starts its turn within 10 feet of the meenlock must succeed on a 11 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the start of the creature's next turn.

traits.name: Light Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in bright light, the meenlock has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Shadow Teleport (Recharge 5-6)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the meenlock can teleport to an unoccupied space within 30 feet of it, provided that both the space it's teleporting from and its destination are in dim light or darkness. The destination need not be within line of sight.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a 11 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Bone Naga (Guardian)

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

spells: The naga is a 5th-level spellcaster (spell save 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks) that needs only verbal components to cast its spells. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom, and it has the following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): mending, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
1st level (4 slots): command, shield of faith
2nd level (3 slots): calm emotions, hold person
3rd level (2 slots): bestow curse

monsters.name: Orthon
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered
monsters.senses: darkvision 120 ft., truesight 30 ft., passive Perception 20

traits.name: Invisibility Field
traits.desc: The orthon can use a bonus action to become invisible. Any equipment the orthon wears or carries is also invisible as long as the equipment is on its person. This invisibility ends immediately after the orthon makes an attack roll or is hit by an attack.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The orthon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Infernal Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d4 + 6) slashing damage, and the target must make a 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a failure, the target is poisoned for 1 minute. The poisoned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Brass Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage, plus one of the following effects:

actions.name: 1.  Acid
actions.desc: The target must make a 17 Constitution saving throw, taking an additional 17 (5d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: 2.  Blindness (1/Day)
actions.desc: The target takes 5 (1d10) radiant damage. In addition, the target and all other creatures within 20 feet of it must each make a successful 17 Dexterity saving throw or be blinded until the end of the orthon's next turn.

actions.name: 3.  Concussion
actions.desc: The target and each creature within 20 feet of it must make a 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 13 (2d12) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: 4.  Entanglement
actions.desc: The target must make a successful 17 Dexterity saving throw or be restrained for 1 hour by strands of sticky webbing. A restrained creature can escape by using an action to make a successful 17 Dexterity or Strength check. Any creature other than an orthon that touches the restrained creature must make a successful 17 Dexterity saving throw or become similarly restrained.

actions.name: 5.  Paralysis (1/Day)
actions.desc: The target takes 22 (4d10) lightning damage and must make a successful 17 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The paralyzed target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: 6.  Tracking
actions.desc: For the next 24 hours, the orthon knows the direction and distance to the target, as long as it's on the same plane of existence. If the target is on a different plane, the orthon knows which one, but not the exact location there.

reactions.name: Explosive Retribution
reactions.desc: When it is reduced to 15 hit points or fewer, the orthon causes itself to explode. All other creatures within 30 feet of it must each make a 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) fire damage plus 9 (2d8) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. This explosion destroys the orthon, its infernal dagger, and its brass crossbow.

monsters.name: Swarm of Beetles
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Bites
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. 10 (4d4) piercing damage, or 5 (2d4) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

monsters.name: Elder Oblex
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this distance), passive Perception 15

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.desc: The oblex can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Aversion to Fire
traits.desc: If the oblex takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Sulfurous Impersonation
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the oblex can extrude a piece of itself that assumes the appearance of one Medium or smaller creature whose memories it has stolen. This simulacrum appears, feels, and sounds exactly like the creature it impersonates, though it smells faintly of sulfur. The oblex can impersonate 2d6 + 1 different creatures, each one tethered to its body by a strand of slime that can extend up to 120 feet away. For all practical purposes, the simulacrum is the oblex, meaning the oblex occupies its space and the simulacrum's space simultaneously. The slimy tether is immune to damage, but it is severed if there is no opening at least 1 inch wide between the oblex's main body and the simulacrum. The simulacrum disappears if the tether is severed.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The elder oblex makes two pseudopod attacks and uses Eat Memories.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (4d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) psychic damage.

actions.name: Eat Memories
actions.desc: The oblex targets one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 18 Wisdom saving throw or take 44 (8d10) psychic damage and become memory drained until it finishes a short or long rest or until it benefits from the greater restoration or heal spell. Constructs, oozes, plants, and undead succeed on the save automatically. While memory drained, the target must roll a d4 and subtract the number rolled from any ability check or attack roll it makes. Each time the target is memory drained beyond the first, the die size increases by one: the d4 becomes a d6, the d6 becomes a d8, and so on until the die becomes a d20, at which point the target becomes unconscious for 1 hour. The effect then ends. When an oblex causes a target to become memory drained, the oblex learns all the languages the target knows and gains all its proficiencies, except any saving throw proficiencies.

spells: The oblex's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 18). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: charm person (as 5th-level spell), detect thoughts, hold person
3/day each: confusion, dimension door, dominate person, fear, hallucinatory terrain, hold monster, hypnotic pattern, telekinesis

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The derro has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the derro has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Hooked Spear
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, the derro can choose to deal no damage and knock it prone.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 16). Until this grapple ends, the creature is restrained, and the snake can't constrict another target.

traits.name: Blurred Movement
traits.desc: Attack rolls against the quickling have disadvantage unless the quickling is incapacitated or restrained.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.desc: If the quickling is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The quickling makes three dagger attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 8 (1d4 + 6) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Swarm of Rats
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The swarm has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny rat. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Bites
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. 7 (2d6) piercing damage, or 3 (1d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

monsters.name: Devourer
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The devourer makes two claw attacks and can use either Imprison Soul or Soul Rend.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 21 (6d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Imprison Soul
actions.desc: The devourer chooses a living humanoid with 0 hit points that it can see within 30 feet of it. That creature is teleported inside the devourer's ribcage and imprisoned there. A creature imprisoned in this manner has disadvantage on death saving throws. If it dies while imprisoned, the devourer regains 25 hit points, immediately recharges Soul Rend, and gains an additional action on its next turn. Additionally, at the start of its next turn, the devourer regurgitates the slain creature as a bonus action, and the creature becomes an undead. If the victim had 2 or fewer Hit Dice, it becomes a zombie. if it had 3 to 5 Hit Dice, it becomes a ghoul. Otherwise, it becomes a wight. A devourer can imprison only one creature at a time.

actions.name: Soul Rend (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The devourer creates a vortex of life-draining energy in a 20-foot radius centered on itself. Each humanoid in that area must make a 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Increase the damage by 10 for each living humanoid with 0 hit points in that area.

monsters.name: Summer Eladrin
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Fearsome Presence
traits.desc: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to any eladrin's Fearsome Presence for the next 24 hours.

traits.name: Fey Step (Recharge 4-6)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the eladrin can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The eladrin makes two weapon attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) fire damage, or 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) fire damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +9 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) fire damage.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: The eladrin adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the eladrin must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monsters.name: Deathlock Mastermind
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered
monsters.senses: darkvision 120 ft. (including magical darkness), passive Perception 14
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Turn Resistance
traits.desc: The deathlock has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

actions.name: Deathly Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (3d6 + 3) necrotic damage).

actions.name: Grave Bolts
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one or two targets. 18 (4d8) necrotic damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it must succeed on a 16 Strength saving throw or become restrained as shadowy tendrils wrap around it for 1 minute. A restrained target can use its action to repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: The deathlock's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
Cantrips (at will): chill touch, mage hand, minor illusion, poison spray
5th level (2 slots): arms of Hadar, blight, counterspell, crown of madness, darkness, dimension door, dispel magic, fly, hold monster, invisibility
At will: detect magic, disguise self, mage armor

monsters.name: Githzerai Anarch

traits.name: Psychic Defense
traits.desc: While the anarch is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The anarch makes three unarmed strikes.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage.

legendary_actions.name: Strike
legendary_actions.desc: The anarch makes one unarmed strike.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: The anarch magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing and carrying, to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of it.

legendary_actions.name: Change Gravity (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The anarch casts the reverse gravity spell. The spell has the normal effect, except that the anarch can orient the area in any direction and creatures and objects fall toward the end of the area.

spells: The anarch's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible)
3/day each: feather fall, jump, see invisibility, shield, telekinesis
1/day each: globe of invulnerability, plane shift, teleportation circle, wall of force

monsters.name: Blue Slaad
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The slaad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The slaad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The slaad makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw or be infected with a disease called chaos phage. While infected, the target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum is reduced by 10 (3d6) every 24 hours. If the disease reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target instantly transforms into a red slaad or, if it has the ability to cast spells of 3rd level or higher, a green slaad. Only a wish spell can reverse the transformation.

monsters.name: Bronze Dragon Wyrmling
monsters.senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 14

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

actions.name: Lightning Breath
actions.desc: The dragon exhales lightning in a 40-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 16 (3d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Repulsion Breath
actions.desc: The dragon exhales repulsion energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 12 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is pushed 30 feet away from the dragon.

traits.name: Blood Frenzy
traits.desc: The quipper has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.desc: The quipper can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 piercing damage.

monsters.name: White Abishai
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the abishai's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The abishai's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Reckless
traits.desc: At the start of its turn, the abishai can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The abishai makes two attacks: one with its longsword and one with its claw.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.

reactions.name: Vicious Reprisal
reactions.desc: In response to taking damage, the abishai makes a bite attack against a random creature within 5 feet of it. If no creature is within reach, the abishai moves up to half its speed toward an enemy it can see, without provoking opportunity attacks.

monsters.name: Necromancer
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic

traits.name: Grim Harvest (1/Turn)
traits.desc: When necromancer kills a creature that is neither a construct nor undead with a spell of 1st level or higher, the necromancer regains hit points equal to twice the spell's level, or three times if it is a necromancy spell.

actions.name: Withering Touch
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (2d4) necrotic damage.

spells: The necromancer is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The necromancer has the following wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): chill touch, dancing lights, mage hand, mending
1st level (4 slots): false life_, mage armor, ray of sickness_
2nd level (3 slots): blindness/deafness_, ray of enfeeblement_, web
3rd level (3 slots): animate dead_, bestow curse_, vampiric touch*
4th level (3 slots): blight*, dimension door, stoneskin
5th level (2 slots): Bigby's hand, cloudkill
6th level (1 slots): circle of death*

monsters.name: Hobgoblin Iron Shadow

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
traits.desc: While the hobgoblin is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hobgoblin makes four attacks, each of which can be an unarmed strike or a dart attack. It can also use Shadow Jaunt once, either before or after one of the attacks.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Dart
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shadow Jaunt
actions.desc: The hobgoblin magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Both the space it is leaving and its destination must be in dim light or darkness.

spells: The hobgoblin is a 2nd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): minor illusion, prestidigitation, true strike
1st level (3 slots): charm person, disguise self, expeditious retreat, silent image

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The bullywug can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
traits.desc: The bullywug can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

traits.name: Swamp Camouflage
traits.desc: The bullywug has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.desc: The bullywug's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The bullywug makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its spear.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

monsters.name: Black Abishai
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the abishai's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The abishai's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the abishai can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The abishai makes three attacks: two with its scimitar and one with its bite.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) acid damage.

actions.name: Creeping Darkness (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The abishai casts darkness at a point within 120 feet of it, requiring no components. Wisdom is its spellcasting ability for this spell. While the spell persists, the abishai can move the area of darkness up to 60 feet as a bonus action.

monsters.name: Efreeti

traits.name: Elemental Demise
traits.desc: If the efreeti dies, its body disintegrates in a flash of fire and puff of smoke, leaving behind only equipment the efreeti was wearing or carrying.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The efreeti makes two scimitar attacks or uses its Hurl Flame twice.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Hurl Flame
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 17 (5d6) fire damage.

spells: The efreeti's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect magic
3/day each: enlarge/reduce, tongues
1/day each: conjure elemental (fire elemental only), gaseous form, invisibility, major image, plane shift, wall of fire

monsters.name: Faerie Dragon (Red)

traits.name: The Colors of Age
traits.desc: A faerie dragon's scales change hue as it ages, moving through all the colors of the rainbow. All faerie dragons have innate spellcasting ability, gaining new spells as they mature. Red—5 years or less Orange—6–10 years Yellow—11–20 years Green—21–30 years Blue—31–40 years Indigo—41–50 years Violet—51 years or more A green or older faerie dragon's CR increases to 2.

traits.name: Superior Invisibility
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the dragon can magically turn invisible until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the dragon wears or carries is invisible with it.

traits.name: Limited Telepathy
traits.desc: Using telepathy, the dragon can magically communicate with any other faerie dragon within 60 feet of it.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The faerie dragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 1 piercing damage.

actions.name: Euphoria Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales a puff of euphoria gas at one creature within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 11 Wisdom saving throw, or for 1 minute, the target can't take reactions and must roll a d6 at the start of each of its turns to determine its behavior during the turn: 1–4. The target takes no action or bonus action and uses all of its movement to move in a random direction. 5–6. The target doesn't move, and the only thing it can do on its turn is make a 11 Wisdom saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: The dragon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 13). It can innately cast a number of spells, requiring no material components:
1/day each: dancing lights, mage hand, minor illusion

monsters.name: Awakened Shrub
monsters.damage_resistances: piercing
monsters.languages: one language known by its creator

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the shrub remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal shrub.

actions.name: Rake
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 (1d4 - 1) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Titivilus
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Titivilus fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Titivilus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Titivilus's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Titivilus regains 10 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes cold or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Titivilus dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Ventriloquism
traits.desc: Whenever Titivilus speaks, he can choose a point within 60 feet; his voice emanates from that point.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Titivilus makes one sword attack and uses his Frightful Word once.

actions.name: Silver Sword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 16 (3d10) necrotic damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage plus 16 (3d10) necrotic damage if used with two hands. If the target is a creature, its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to half the necrotic damage it takes.

actions.name: Frightful Word
actions.desc: Titivilus targets one creature he can see within 10 feet of him. The target must succeed on a 21 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. While frightened in this way, the target must take the Dash action and move away from Titivilus by the safest available route on each of its turns, unless there is nowhere to move, in which case it needn't take the Dash action. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: Titivilus magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

actions.name: Twisting Words
actions.desc: Titivilus targets one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. The target must make a 21 Charisma saving throw. On a failure the target is charmed for 1 minute. The charmed target can repeat the saving throw if Titivilus deals any damage to it. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to Titivilus's Twisting Words for 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: Assault (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Titivilus attacks with his silver sword or uses his Frightful Word.

legendary_actions.name: Corrupting Guidance
legendary_actions.desc: Titivilus uses Twisting Words. Alternatively, he targets one creature charmed by him that is within 60 feet of him; that charmed target must make a 21 Charisma saving throw. On a failure, Titivilus decides how the target acts during its next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: Titivilus uses his Teleport action.

spells: Titivilus's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 21). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: alter self, animate dead, bestow curse, confusion, major image, modify memory, nondetection, sending, suggestion
3/day each: greater invisibility (self only), mislead
1/day each: feeblemind, symbol (discord or sleep only)

monsters.name: Rug of Smothering
