Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

spells: The lizardfolk is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The lizardfolk has the following druid spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, produce flame, thorn whip
1st level (4 slots): entangle, fog cloud
2nd level (3 slots): heat metal, spike growth
3rd level (2 slots): conjure animals (reptiles only), plant growth

monsters.name: Banshee
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, fire, lightning, thunder, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

traits.name: Detect Life
traits.desc: The banshee can magically sense the presence of living creatures up to 5 miles away that aren't undead or constructs. She knows the general direction they're in but not their exact locations.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The banshee can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. She takes 5 (1d10) force damage if she ends her turn inside an object.

actions.name: Corrupting Touch
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (3d6 + 2) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Horrifying Visage
actions.desc: Each non-undead creature within 60 feet of the banshee that can see her must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the banshee is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the banshee's Horrifying Visage for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Wail (1/Day)
actions.desc: The banshee releases a mournful wail, provided that she isn't in sunlight. This wail has no effect on constructs and undead. All other creatures within 30 feet of her that can hear her must make a 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature drops to 0 hit points. On a success, a creature takes 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

monsters.name: Kuo-toa Archpriest

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Otherworldly Perception
traits.desc: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is invisible or on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

traits.name: Slippery
traits.desc: The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The kuo-toa makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Scepter
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) lightning damage.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

spells: The kuo-toa is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The kuo-toa has the following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): guidance, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
1st level (4 slots): detect magic, sanctuary, shield of faith
2nd level (3 slots): hold person, spiritual weapon
3rd level (3 slots): spirit guardians, tongues
4th level (3 slots): control water, divination
5th level (2 slots): mass cure wounds, scrying

monsters.name: Duergar
monsters.damage_resistances: poison

traits.name: Duergar Resilience
traits.desc: The duergar has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being charmed or paralyzed.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the duergar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Enlarge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: For 1 minute, the duergar magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, the duergar is Large, doubles its damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If the duergar lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

actions.name: War Pick
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage, or 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage while enlarged.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage while enlarged.

actions.name: Invisibility (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: The duergar magically turns invisible until it attacks, casts a spell, or uses its Enlarge, or until its concentration is broken, up to 1 hour (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the duergar wears or carries is invisible with it.

monsters.name: Choldrith

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The choldrith has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the choldrith to sleep.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The choldrith can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the choldrith has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Web Sense
traits.desc: While in contact with a web, the choldrith knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.desc: The choldrith ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Web (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one Large or smaller creature. The target is restrained by webbing. As an action, the restrained target can make a 11 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; 5 hit points; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

spells: The choldrith is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The choldrith has the following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): guidance, mending, resistance, thaumaturgy
1st level (4 slots): bane, healing word, sanctuary, shield of faith
2nd level (3 slots): hold person, spiritual weapon (dagger)

monsters.name: Cadaver Collector
monsters.damage_immunities: necrotic, poison, psychic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands all languages but can't speak

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The cadaver collector has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Summon Specters (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the cadaver collector calls up the enslaved spirits of those it has slain; 1d6 specter||specters (without Sunlight Sensitivity) arise in unoccupied spaces within 15 feet of the cadaver collector. The specters act right after the cadaver collector on the same initiative count and fight until they're destroyed. They disappear when the cadaver collector is destroyed.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The cadaver collector makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 16 (3d10) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Paralyzing Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The cadaver collector releases paralyzing gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a successful 18 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. A paralyzed creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a success.

monsters.name: Star Spawn Hulk
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Psychic Mirror
traits.desc: If the hulk takes psychic damage, each creature within 10 feet of the hulk takes that damage instead; the hulk takes none of the damage. In addition, the hulk's thoughts and location can't be discerned by magic.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hulk makes two slam attacks. If both attacks hit the same target, the target also takes 9 (2d8) psychic damage and must succeed on a 17 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the target's next turn.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Reaping Arms (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The hulk makes a separate slam attack against each creature within 10 feet of it. Each creature that is hit must also succeed on a 17 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.

monsters.name: Githyanki Gish

traits.name: War Magic
traits.desc: When the githyanki uses its action to cast a spell, it can make one weapon attack as a bonus action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The githyanki makes two longsword attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage if used with two hands.

spells: The githyanki's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
Cantrips (at will): blade ward, light, message, true strike
1st level (4 slots): expeditious retreat, magic missile, sleep, thunderwave
2nd level (3 slots): blur, invisibility, levitate
3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fireball, haste
4th level (2 slots): dimension door
At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible)
3/day each: jump, misty step, nondetection (self only)
1/day each: plane shift, telekinesis

monsters.name: War Priest

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The priest makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Maul
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

reactions.name: Guided Strike (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
reactions.desc: The priest grants a +10 bonus to an attack roll made by itself or another creature within 30 feet of it. The priest can make this choice after the roll is made but before it hits or misses.

spells: The priest is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): light, mending, sacred flame, spare the dying
1st level (4 slots): divine favor, guiding bolt, healing word, shield of faith
2nd level (3 slots): lesser restoration, magic weapon, prayer of healing, silence, spiritual weapon
3rd level (3 slots): beacon of hope, crusader's mantle, dispel magic, revivify, spirit guardians, water walk
4th level (3 slots): banishment, freedom of movement, guardian of faith, stoneskin
5th level (1 slots): flame strike, mass cure wounds, hold monster

monsters.name: Oni

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The oni's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The oni regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The oni makes two attacks, either with its claws or its glaive.

actions.name: Claw (Oni Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Glaive
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage in Small or Medium form.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.desc: The oni magically polymorphs into a Small or Medium humanoid, into a Large giant, or back into its true form. Other than its size, its statistics are the same in each form. The only equipment that is transformed is its glaive, which shrinks so that it can be wielded in humanoid form. If the oni dies, it reverts to its true form, and its glaive reverts to its normal size.

spells: The oni's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 13). The oni can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: darkness, invisibility
1/day each: charm person, cone of cold, gaseous form, sleep

monsters.name: Mezzoloth
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 13

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The mezzoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The mezzoloth's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mezzoloth makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its trident.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Trident
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage when held with two claws and used to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: The mezzoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spells: The mezzoloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 11). The mezzoloth can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
2/day each: darkness, dispel magic
1/day each: cloudkill

monsters.name: Booyahg Slave of the Fiend
monsters.damage_resistances: slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons
monsters.languages: any two languages (usually Abyssal or Infernal), Goblin

traits.name: Dark One's Own Luck (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: When the goblin makes an ability check or saving throw, it can add a d10 to the roll. It can do this after the roll is made but before any of the roll's effects occur.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.desc: The goblin can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) fire damage.

spells: The goblin's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells (spell save 15), requiring no material components:
Cantrips (at will): eldritch blast, fire bolt, friends, mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, shocking grasp
5th level (4 slots): banishment, burning hands, flame strike, hellish rebuke, magic circle, scorching ray, scrying, stinking cloud, suggestion, wall of fire
At will: alter self, false life, levitate (self only), mage armor (self only), silent image
1/day each: feeblemind, finger of death, plane shift

monsters.name: Iron Cobra
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The iron cobra has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or suffer one random poison effect: 1.  Poison Damage: The target takes 13 (3d8) poison damage.2.  Confusion: On its next turn, the target must use its action to make one weapon attack against a random creature it can see within 30 feet of it, using whatever weapon it has in hand and moving beforehand if necessary to get in range. If it's holding no weapon, it makes an unarmed strike. If no creature is visible within 30 feet, it takes the Dash action, moving toward the nearest creature. 3.  Paralysis: The target is paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
traits.desc: While the adept is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The adept makes three unarmed strikes or three dart attacks.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, the adept can choose one of the following additional effects:

actions.name: The target must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw or drop one item it is holding (adept's choice).
The target must succeed on a 13 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.
The target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the adept's next turn.
Dart
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Deflect Missile
reactions.desc: In response to being hit by a ranged weapon attack, the adept deflects the missile. The damage it takes from the attack is reduced by 1d10 + 3. If the damage is reduced to 0, the adept catches the missile if it's small enough to hold in one hand and the adept has a hand free.

monsters.name: Planetar
monsters.damage_resistances: radiant, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Angelic Weapons
traits.desc: The planetar's weapon attacks are magical. When the planetar hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 5d8 radiant damage (included in the attack).

traits.name: Divine Awareness
traits.desc: The planetar knows if it hears a lie.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The planetar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The planetar makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 21 (4d6 + 7) slashing damage plus 22 (5d8) radiant damage.

actions.name: Healing Touch (4/Day)
actions.desc: The planetar touches another creature. The target magically regains 30 (6d8 + 3) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

spells: The planetar's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 20). The planetar can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect evil and good, invisibility (self only)
3/day each: blade barrier, dispel evil and good, flame strike, raise dead
1/day each: commune, control weather, insect plague

monsters.name: Giant Spider
monsters.senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 10

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Web Sense
traits.desc: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.desc: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

actions.name: Web (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one creature. The target is restrained by webbing. As an action, the restrained target can make a 12 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

monsters.name: Warlock of the Fiend
monsters.damage_resistances: slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons
monsters.languages: any two languages (usually Abyssal or Infernal)

traits.name: Dark One's Own Luck (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: When the warlock makes an ability check or saving throw, it can add a d10 to the roll. It can do this after the roll is made but before any of the roll's effects occur.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) fire damage.

spells: The warlock's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells (spell save 15), requiring no material components:
Cantrips (at will): eldritch blast, fire bolt, friends, mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, shocking grasp
5th level (4 slots): banishment, burning hands, flame strike, hellish rebuke, magic circle, scorching ray, scrying, stinking cloud, suggestion, wall of fire
At will: alter self, false life, levitate (self only), mage armor (self only), silent image
1/day each: feeblemind, finger of death, plane shift

monsters.name: Storm Giant Quintessent
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The giant can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two Lightning Sword attacks or uses Wind Javelin twice.

actions.name: Lightning Sword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 40 (9d6 + 9) lightning damage.

actions.name: Windjavelin
actions.desc: The giant coalesces wind into a javelin-like form and hurls it at a creature it can see within 600 feet of it. The javelin is considered a magic weapon and deals 19 (3d6 + 9) piercing damage to the target, striking unerringly. The javelin disappears after it hits.

legendary_actions.name: Gust
legendary_actions.desc: The giant targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of it and creates a magical gust of wind around it. The target must succeed on a 18 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 20 feet in any horizontal direction the giant chooses.

legendary_actions.name: Thunderbolt (2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The giant hurls a thunderbolt at a creature it can see within 600 feet of it. The target must make a 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: One with the Storm (3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The giant vanishes, dispersing itself into the storm surrounding its lair. The giant can end this effect at the start of any of its turns, becoming a giant once more and appearing in any location it chooses within its lair. While dispersed, the giant can't take any actions other than lair actions, and it can't be targeted by attacks, spells

monsters.name: Dhergoloth
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 10

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The dhergoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The dhergoloth's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dhergoloth makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Flailing Claws (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dhergoloth moves up to its walking speed in a straight line and targets each creature within 5 feet of it during its movement. Each target must succeed on a 14 Dexterity saving throw or take 22 (3d12 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: The dhergoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spells: The dhergoloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 10). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: darkness, fear
3/day each: sleep

monsters.name: Deva
monsters.damage_resistances: radiant, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Angelic Weapons
traits.desc: The deva's weapon attacks are magical. When the deva hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 4d8 radiant damage (included in the attack).

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The deva has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The deva makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) radiant damage.

actions.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
actions.desc: The deva touches another creature. The target magically regains 20 (4d8 + 2) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.desc: The deva magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating equal to or less than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the deva's choice). In a new form, the deva retains its game statistics and ability to speak, but its AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and special senses are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks.

spells: The deva's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 17). The deva can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:
At will: detect evil and good
1/day each: commune, raise dead

monsters.name: Ulitharid

traits.name: Creature Sense
traits.desc: The ulitharid is aware of the presence of creatures within 2 miles of it that have an Intelligence score of 4 or higher. It knows the distance and direction to each creature, as well as each creature's intelligence score, but can't sense anything else about it. A creature protected by a mind blank spell, a nondetection spell, or similar magic can't be perceived in this manner.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The ulitharid has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Psionic Hub
traits.desc: If an elder brain establishes a psychic link with the ulitharid, the elder brain can form a psychic link with any other creature the ulitharid can detect using its Creature Sense. Any such link ends if the creature falls outside the telepathy ranges of both the ulitharid and the elder brain. The ulitharid can maintain its psychic link with the elder brain regardless of the distance between them, so long as they are both on the same plane of existence. If the ulitharid is more than 5 miles away from the elder brain, it can end the psychic link at any time (no action required).

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 27 (4d10 + 5) psychic damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is grappled (escape 14) and must succeed on a 17 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until this grapple ends.

actions.name: Extract Brain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated humanoid grappled by the ulitharid. 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the ulitharid kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

actions.name: Mind Blast (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The ulitharid magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 17 Intelligence saving throw or take 31 (4d12 + 5) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: The ulitharid's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 17). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: detect thoughts, levitate
1/day each: confusion, dominate monster, eyebite, feeblemind, mass suggestion, plane shift (self only), project image, scrying, telekinesis

monsters.name: Duergar Despot

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The duergar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Psychic Engine
traits.desc: When the duergar despot suffers a critical hit or is reduced to 0 hit points, psychic energy erupts from its frame to deal 14 (4d6) psychic damage to each creature within 5 feet of it.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the duergar despot has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The despot makes two iron fist attacks and two stomping foot attacks. It can replace up to four of these attacks with uses of its Flame Jet.

actions.name: Iron Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must make a successful 17 Strength saving throw or be thrown up to 30 feet away in a straight line. The target is knocked prone and then takes 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Stomping Foot
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage, or 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage to a prone target.

actions.name: Flame Jet
actions.desc: The duergar spews flames in a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spells: The duergar despot's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 12). It can cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: mage hand, minor illusion
1/day each: counterspell, misty step, stinking cloud

monsters.name: Djinni

traits.name: Elemental Demise
traits.desc: If the djinni dies, its body disintegrates into a warm breeze, leaving behind only equipment the djinni was wearing or carrying.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The djinni makes three scimitar attacks.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) lightning or thunder damage (djinni's choice).

actions.name: Create Whirlwind
actions.desc: A 5-foot-radius, 30-foot-tall cylinder of swirling air magically forms on a point the djinni can see within 120 feet of it. The whirlwind lasts as long as the djinni maintains concentration (as if concentrating on a spell). Any creature but the djinni that enters the whirlwind must succeed on a 18 Strength saving throw or be restrained by it. The djinni can move the whirlwind up to 60 feet as an action, and creatures restrained by the whirlwind move with it. The whirlwind ends if the djinni loses sight of it. A creature can use its action to free a creature restrained by the whirlwind, including itself, by succeeding on a 18 Strength check. If the check succeeds, the creature is no longer restrained and moves to the nearest space outside the whirlwind.

spells: The djinni's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect evil and good, detect magic, thunderwave
3/day each: create food and water (can create wine instead of water), tongues, wind walk
1/day each: conjure elemental (air elemental only), creation, gaseous form, invisibility, major image, plane shift

monsters.name: Annis Hag
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The annis makes three attacks: one with her bite and two with her claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (3d6 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (3d6 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Crushing Hug
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 36 (9d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 15) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until the grapple ends, the target takes 36 (9d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of the hag's turns. The hag can't make attacks while grappling a creature in this way.

spells: The hag's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 13). She can innately cast the following spells:
3/day each: disguise self (including the form of a Medium humanoid), fog cloud

monsters.name: Drow Mage

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands, plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Summon Demon (1/Day)
actions.desc: The drow magically summons a quasit, or attempts to summon a shadow demon with a {@chance 50|50 percent|50% summoning chance} chance of success. The summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 10 minutes, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

spells: The drow's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 12). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
Cantrips (at will): mage hand, minor illusion, poison spray, ray of frost
1st level (4 slots): mage armor, magic missile, shield, witch bolt
2nd level (3 slots): alter self, misty step, web
3rd level (3 slots): fly, lightning bolt
4th level (3 slots): Evard's black tentacles, greater invisibility
5th level (2 slots): cloudkill
At will: dancing lights
1/day each: darkness, faerie fire, levitate (self only)

monsters.name: Drider

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The drider has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drider to sleep.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The drider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the drider has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.desc: The drider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The drider makes three attacks, either with its longsword or its longbow. It can replace one of those attacks with a bite attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 2 (1d4) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) poison damage.

spells: The drider's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 13). The drider can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: dancing lights
1/day each: darkness, faerie fire

monsters.name: Death Slaad
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 18

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: The slaad can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The slaad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The slaad's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The slaad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The slaad makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws or greatsword.

actions.name: Bite (Slaad Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Claws (Slaad Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d10 + 5) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

spells: The slaad's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The slaad can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect magic, detect thoughts, invisibility (self only), mage hand, major image
2/day each: fear, fireball, fly, tongues
1/day each: cloudkill, plane shift

monsters.name: Graz'zt
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing that is nonmagical
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: Graz'zt can use his action to polymorph into a form that resembles a Medium humanoid, or back into his true form. Aside from his size, his statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment he is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Graz'zt fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Graz'zt has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Graz'zt's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Graz'zt attacks twice with Wave of Sorrow.

actions.name: Wave of Sorrow (Greatsword)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 20 (4d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) acid damage.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: Graz'zt magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Graz'zt attacks once with Wave of Sorrow.

legendary_actions.name: Dance, My Puppet
legendary_actions.desc: One creature charmed by Graz'zt that Graz'zt can see must use its reaction to move up to its speed as Graz'zt directs.

legendary_actions.name: Sow Discord
legendary_actions.desc: Graz'zt casts crown of madness or dissonant whispers.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: Graz'zt uses his Teleport action.

spells: Graz'zt's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 23). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: charm person, crown of madness, detect magic, dispel magic, dissonant whispers
3/day each: counterspell, darkness, dominate person, sanctuary, telekinesis, teleport
1/day each: dominate monster, greater invisibility

monsters.name: Alhoon
monsters.alignment: lawful or neutral (law/chaos axis) or chaotic or evil
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, lightning, necrotic

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The alhoon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Turn Resistance
traits.desc: The alhoon has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

actions.name: Chilling Grasp
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (3d6) cold damage.

actions.name: Mind Blast (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The alhoon magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 16 Intelligence saving throw or take 22 (4d8 + 4) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: The alhoon's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 16). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
Cantrips (at will): chill touch, dancing lights, mage hand, prestidigitation, shocking grasp
1st level (4 slots): detect magic, disguise self, magic missile, shield
2nd level (3 slots): invisibility, mirror image, scorching ray
3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fly, lightning bolt
4th level (3 slots): confusion, Evard's black tentacles, phantasmal killer
5th level (2 slots): modify memory, wall of force
6th level (1 slots): disintegrate, globe of invulnerability
At will: detect thoughts, levitate
1/day each: dominate monster, plane shift (self only)

monsters.name: Gloom Weaver

traits.name: Burden of Time
traits.desc: Beasts and humanoids, other than shadar-kai, have disadvantage on saving throws while within 10 feet of the gloom weaver.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The gloom weaver has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The gloom weaver makes two spear attacks and casts one spell that takes 1 action to cast.

actions.name: Shadow Spear
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 26 (4d12) necrotic damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 26 (4d12) necrotic damage if used with two hands.

reactions.name: Misty Escape (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
reactions.desc: When the gloom weaver takes damage, it turns invisible and teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. It remains invisible until the start of its next turn or until it attacks or casts a spell.

spells: The gloom weaver's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
Cantrips (at will): minor illusion, prestidigitation, chill touch, eldritch blast*
5th level (3 slots): armor of Agathys, blight, darkness, dream, invisibility, fear, hypnotic pattern, major image, contact other plane, vampiric touch, witch bolt
At will: arcane eye, mage armor, speak with dead
1/day each: arcane gate, bane, compulsion, confusion, true seeing

spells.spellsNotes: *3 beams +4 bonus to each damage roll

monsters.name: Cloud Giant Smiling One

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The giant has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two attacks with its morningstar.

actions.name: Morningstar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 21 (3d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage. The attack deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage if the giant has advantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +12 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage. The attack deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage if the giant has advantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.desc: The giant magically polymorphs into a beast or humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Any equipment the giant is wearing or carrying is absorbed by the new form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

spells: The giant's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
Cantrips (at will): minor illusion, prestidigitation, vicious mockery
1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, disguise self, silent image, Tasha's hideous laughter
2nd level (3 slots): invisibility, suggestion
3rd level (2 slots): major image, tongues
At will: detect magic, fog cloud, light
3/day each: feather fall, fly, misty step, telekinesis
1/day each: control weather, gaseous form

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The badger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 piercing damage.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.desc: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

traits.name: Underwater Camouflage
traits.desc: The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.desc: The octopus can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 10). Until this grapple ends, the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

actions.name: Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: A 5-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

monsters.name: Nightmare
monsters.languages: understands Abyssal, Common, and Infernal but can't speak

traits.name: Confer Fire Resistance
traits.desc: The nightmare can grant resistance to fire damage to anyone riding it.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: The nightmare sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Ethereal Stride
actions.desc: The nightmare and up to three willing creatures within 5 feet of it magically enter the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa.

traits.name: Tail Spike Regrowth
traits.desc: The manticore has twenty-four tail spikes. Used spikes regrow when the manticore finishes a long rest.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The manticore makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws or three with its tail spikes.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail Spike
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 100/200 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.desc: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: The goblin found a magic item (a necklace of fireballs, a circlet of blasting, or the like) and learned how to use it.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Rancid Degeneration
traits.desc: At the end of each of the troll's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 11 (2d10) necrotic damage, unless the troll has taken acid or fire damage since the end of its last turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) necrotic damage.

monsters.name: Ochre Jelly
monsters.damage_resistances: acid
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, prone
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 8

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.desc: The jelly can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The jelly can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) acid damage.

reactions.name: Split
reactions.desc: When a jelly that is Medium or larger is subjected to lightning or slashing damage, it splits into two new jellies if it has at least 10 hit points. Each new jelly has hit points equal to half the original jelly's, rounded down. New jellies are one size smaller than the original jelly.

monsters.name: The Hungry
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing while in dim light or darkness

traits.name: Life Hunger
traits.desc: If a creature the Hungry can see regains hit points, the Hungry gains two benefits until the end of its next turn: it has advantage on attack rolls, and its bite deals an extra 22 (4d10) necrotic damage on a hit.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Hungry makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (4d6 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape 16) and is restrained until the grapple ends. While grappling a creature, the Hungry can't attack with its claws.

monsters.name: Swarm of Cranium Rats
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the swarm can shed dim light from its brains in a 5-foot radius, increase the illumination to bright light in a 5 to 20-foot radius (and dim light for an additional number of feet equal to the chosen radius), or extinguish the light.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny rat. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

traits.name: Telepathic Shroud
traits.desc: The swarm is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts. as well as to all divination spells.

actions.name: Bites
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. 14 (4d6) piercing damage, or 7 (2d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

spells: The swarm's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 13). As long as it has more than half of its hit points, it can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: command, comprehend languages, detect thoughts
1/day each: confusion, dominate monster

monsters.name: Duergar Warlord
monsters.damage_resistances: poison

traits.name: Duergar Resilience
traits.desc: The duergar has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being charmed or paralyzed.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the duergar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The duergar makes three hammer or javelin attacks and uses Call to Attack, or Enlarge if it is available.

actions.name: Psychic-Attuned Hammer
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 5 (1d10) psychic damage, or 15 (2d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 5 (1d10) psychic damage while enlarged,

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage while enlarged.

actions.name: Call to Attack
actions.desc: Up to three allied duergar within 120 feet of this duergar that can hear it can each use their reaction to make one weapon attack.

actions.name: Enlarge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: For 1 minute, the duergar magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, the duergar is Large, doubles its damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If the duergar lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

actions.name: Invisibility (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: The duergar magically turns invisible for up to 1 hour or until it attacks, it casts a spell, it uses its Enlarge, or its concentration is broken (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the duergar wears or carries is invisible with it.

reactions.name: Scouring Instruction
reactions.desc: When an ally that the duergar can see makes a d20 roll, the duergar can roll a 1d6 and the ally can add the number rolled to the d20 roll by taking 3 (1d6) psychic damage. A creature immune to psychic damage can't be affected by Scouring Instruction.

monsters.name: Incubus
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Telepathic Bond
traits.desc: The fiend ignores the range restriction on its telepathy when communicating with a creature it has charmed. The two don't even need to be on the same plane of existence.

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: The fiend can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Without wings, the fiend loses its flying speed. Other than its size and speed, its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

actions.name: Claw (Fiend Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Charm
actions.desc: One humanoid the fiend can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a 15 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed for 1 day. The charmed target obeys the fiend's verbal or telepathic commands. If the target suffers any harm or receives a suicidal command, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success. If the target successfully saves against the effect, or if the effect on it ends, the target is immune to this fiend's Charm for the next 24 hours. The fiend can have only one target charmed at a time. If it charms another, the effect on the previous target ends.

actions.name: Draining Kiss
actions.desc: The fiend kisses a creature charmed by it or a willing creature. The target must make a 15 Constitution saving throw against this magic, taking 32 (5d10 + 5) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

actions.name: Etherealness
actions.desc: The fiend magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the cranium rat can shed dim light from its brain in a 5-foot radius or extinguish the light.

traits.name: Telepathic Shroud
traits.desc: The cranium rat is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as to all divination spells.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 piercing damage.

traits.desc: A faerie dragon's scales change hue as it ages, moving through all the colors of the rainbow. All faerie dragons have innate spellcasting ability, gaining new spells as they mature. Red—5 years or less Orange—6–10 years Yellow—11–20 years Green—21–30 years Blue—31–40 years Indigo—41–50 years Violet—51 years or more A green or older faerie dragon's CR increases to 2.

traits.name: Superior Invisibility
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the dragon can magically turn invisible until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the dragon wears or carries is invisible with it.

The target takes no action or bonus action and uses all of its movement to move in a random direction. 5–6. The target doesn't move, and the only thing it can do on its turn is make a 11 Wisdom saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: The dragon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 13). It can innately cast a number of spells, requiring no material components:
1/day each: color spray, dancing lights, mage hand, minor illusion
