actions.desc: The myrmidon makes two maul attacks.

actions.name: Maul
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Thunderous Strike (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The myrmidon makes one maul attack. On a hit, the target takes an extra 16 (3d10) thunder damage, and the target must succeed on a 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Fire Absorption
traits.desc: Whenever the giant strider is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of hit points equal to half the fire damage dealt.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Fire Burst (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The giant strider hurls a gout of flame at a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire spreads around corners, and it ignites flammable objects in that area that aren't being worn or carried.

traits.name: Trampling Charge
traits.desc: If the triceratops moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the triceratops can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 24 (4d8 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Stomp
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. 22 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage

traits.name: Dive Attack
traits.desc: If the quetzalcoatlus is flying and dives at least 30 feet toward a target and then hits with a bite attack, the attack deals an extra 10 (3d6) damage to the target.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The quetzalcoatlus doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 12 (3d6 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Keen Sight
traits.desc: The hawk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 slashing damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The badger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The badger makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (2d4 + 1) slashing damage.

traits.name: Archer's Eye (3/Day)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the archer can add 1d10 to its next attack or damage roll with a longbow or shortbow.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The archer makes two attacks with its longbow.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Red Abishai
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the abishai's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The abishai's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The abishai can use its Frightful Presence. It also makes three attacks: one with its morningstar, one with its claw, and one with its bite.

actions.name: Morningstar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d8 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (2d10 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 38 (7d10) fire damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of the abishai's choice that is within 120 feet and aware of it must succeed on a 18 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the abishai's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Incite Fanaticism
actions.desc: The abishai chooses up to four of its allies within 60 feet of it that can see it. For 1 minute, each of those allies makes attack rolls with advantage and can't be frightened.

actions.name: Power of the Dragon Queen
actions.desc: The abishai targets one dragon it can see within 120 feet of it. The dragon must make a 18 Charisma saving throw. A chromatic dragon makes this save with disadvantage. On a successful save, the target is immune to the abishai's Power of the Dragon Queen for 1 hour. On a failed save, the target is charmed by the abishai for 1 hour. While charmed in this way, the target regards the abishai as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. This effect ends if the abishai or its companions deal damage to the target.

monsters.name: Slaad Tadpole
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The slaad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Vegepygmy
monsters.damage_resistances: lightning, piercing

traits.name: Plant Camouflage
traits.desc: The vegepygmy has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring plant life.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The vegepygmy regains 3 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes cold, fire, or necrotic damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vegepygmy's next turn. The vegepygmy dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Sling
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Zombie
monsters.languages: understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.desc: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Two Heads
traits.desc: The ettin has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.

traits.name: Wakeful
traits.desc: When one of the ettin's heads is asleep, its other head is awake.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ettin makes two attacks: one with its battleaxe and one with its morningstar.

actions.name: Battleaxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Morningstar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Nycaloth
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 14

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The nycaloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The nycaloth's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The nycaloth makes two melee attacks, or it makes one melee attack and teleports before or after the attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw or take 5 (2d4) slashing damage at the start of each of its turns due to a fiendish wound. Each time the nycaloth hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 5 (2d4). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful 13 Wisdom (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 18 (2d12 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: The nycaloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spells: The nycaloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. The nycaloth can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: darkness, detect magic, dispel magic, invisibility (self only), mirror image

monsters.name: Young Remorhaz
monsters.senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 10

traits.name: Heated Body
traits.desc: A creature that touches the remorhaz or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 (2d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 20 (3d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

traits.name: Mimicry
traits.desc: The raven can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful 10 Wisdom (Insight) check.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 piercing damage.

traits.name: Aggressive
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the orog can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The orog makes two greataxe attacks.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Shrieker
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 6

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the shrieker remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary fungus.

actions.name: Shriek
actions.desc: When bright light or a creature is within 30 feet of the shrieker, it emits a shriek audible within 300 feet of it. The shrieker continues to shriek until the disturbance moves out of range and for 1d4 of the shrieker's turns afterward.

monsters.name: Swarm of Centipedes
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Bites
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. 10 (4d4) piercing damage, or 5 (2d4) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by a swarm of centipedes is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

monsters.name: Apprentice Wizard

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

spells: The apprentice is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, mending, prestidigitation
1st level (2 slots): burning hands, disguise self, shield

monsters.name: Grick Alpha
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Stone Camouflage
traits.desc: The grick has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The grick makes two attacks: one with its tail and one with its tentacles. If it hits with its tentacles, the grick can make one beak attack against the same target.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 22 (4d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

traits.name: Brave
traits.desc: The knight has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The knight makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

actions.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: For 1 minute, the knight can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the knight. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the knight is incapacitated.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: The knight adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monsters.name: Maurezhi
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, necrotic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Assume Form
traits.desc: The maurezhi can assume the appearance of any Medium humanoid it has eaten. It remains in this form for 1d6 days, during which time the form gradually decays until, when the effect ends, the form sloughs from the demon's body.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The maurezhi has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The maurezhi makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, its Charisma score is reduced by 1d4. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. The target dies if this reduces its Charisma to 0. It rises 24 hours later as a ghoul, unless it has been revived or its corpse has been destroyed.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead, it must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Raise Ghoul (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The maurezhi targets one dead ghoul or ghast it can see within 30 feet of it. The target is revived with all its hit points.

monsters.name: Death Knight

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The death knight has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Marshal Undead
traits.desc: Unless the death knight is incapacitated, it and undead creatures of its choice within 60 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against features that turn undead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The death knight makes three longsword attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage, or 10 (1d10 + 5) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 18 (4d8) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Hellfire Orb (1/Day)
actions.desc: The death knight hurls a magical ball of fire that explodes at a point it can see within 120 feet of it. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a 18 Dexterity saving throw. The sphere spreads around corners. A creature takes 35 (10d6) fire damage and 35 (10d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: The death knight adds 6 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the death knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

spells: The death knight is a 19th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following paladin spells prepared:
1st level (4 slots): command, compelled duel, searing smite
2nd level (3 slots): hold person, magic weapon
3rd level (3 slots): dispel magic, elemental weapon
4th level (3 slots): banishment, staggering smite
5th level (2 slots): destructive wave (necrotic)

monsters.name: Young Red Shadow Dragon
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 18

traits.name: Living Shadow
traits.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the dragon has resistance to damage that isn't force, psychic, or radiant.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the dragon can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the dragon has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shadow Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales shadowy fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 56 (16d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A humanoid reduced to 0 hit points by this damage dies, and an undead shadow rises from its corpse and acts immediately after the dragon in the initiative count. The shadow is under the dragon's control.

monsters.name: Githyanki Knight

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The githyanki makes two silver greatsword attacks.

actions.name: Silver Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage. This is a magic weapon attack. On a critical hit against a target in an astral body (as with the astral projection spell), the githyanki can cut the silvery cord that tethers the target to its material body, instead of dealing damage.

spells: The githyanki's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible)
3/day each: jump, misty step, nondetection (self only), tongues
1/day each: plane shift, telekinesis

monsters.name: Ice Devil
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 12

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The devil makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its claws, and one with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) cold damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d4 + 5) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) cold damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) cold damage.

actions.name: Wall of Ice (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The devil magically forms an opaque wall of ice on a solid surface it can see within 60 feet of it. The wall is 1 foot thick and up to 30 feet long and 10 feet high, or it's a hemispherical dome up to 20 feet in diameter. When the wall appears, each creature in its space is pushed out of it by the shortest route. The creature chooses which side of the wall to end up on, unless the creature is incapacitated. The creature then makes a 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 (10d6) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The wall lasts for 1 minute or until the devil is incapacitated or dies. The wall can be damaged and breached; each 10-foot section has AC 5, 30 hit points, vulnerability to fire damage, and immunity to acid, cold, necrotic, poison, and psychic damage. If a section is destroyed, it leaves behind a sheet of frigid air in the space the wall occupied. Whenever a creature finishes moving through the frigid air on a turn, willingly or otherwise, the creature must make a 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The frigid air dissipates when the rest of the wall vanishes.

monsters.name: Githyanki Warrior

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The githyanki makes two greatsword attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) psychic damage.

spells: The githyanki's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible)
3/day each: jump, misty step, nondetection (self only)

monsters.name: Symbaroum Monster Nipper
monsters.damage_resistances: psychic; bludgeoning, piercing and slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Amphibian
traits.desc: The nipper can breathe in water and air.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The nipper has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the nipper’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn’t incapacitated.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

reactions.name: Cling
reactions.desc: The nipper has advantage on checks or saving throws to avoid being grappled or shoved.

traits.name: Action Surge (1/day)
traits.desc: the plunderer can take an extra action.

traits.name: Tough
traits.desc: the plunderer has 1 extra hit point for each Hit Die it has.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: the plunderer makes two attacks with its maul.

actions.name: Maul
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage

reactions.name: Two-handed Force
reactions.desc: If the plunderer misses an attack, it can use its reaction to reroll the attack.

traits.name: Noisy
traits.desc: While wearing its armor the bailiff has disad- vantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: the bailiff makes two attacks with its longsword.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach   5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if wielded with two hands.

reactions.name: Bid to Action
reactions.desc: When a creature’s turn ends, the bailiff can call out a command, allowing an allied crea-ture that can see and hear the bailiff to take their turn next. they cannot have already acted this round and this effect ends when their turn ends

monsters.name: Symbaroum Monster Sapper
monsters.equipment: 1d4 + 1 burning powder, 1d4 + 1 bang powder, 1d4 grenades, 1d10 thaler

traits.name: Alchemical Weapons
traits.desc: the sapper is trained in alchemi- cal weapons.

traits.name: Backstab (1/turn)
traits.desc: the sapper deals an extra 10 (3d6) damage when it hits a target with a melee or alchemical weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the sapper that isn’t incapacitated and the sapper doesn’t have disadvantage on the attack roll.

traits.name: Enduring March
traits.desc: the sapper has advantage on saving throws against exhaustion.

traits.name: Noisy
traits.desc: While wearing its armor the sapper has disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

traits.name: Siege Expert
traits.desc: the sapper is trained in siege equipment and its attacks do double damage against structures.

actions.name: Firetube (Portable)
actions.desc: When the sapper fires the tube, each creature in a 20-foot cone must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking half damage on a success. the damage is based on the powder loaded: Bang: 5 (1d10) thunder; Burning: 6 (1d12) fire; Flash: 3 (1d6) fire + the creature is blinded until the end of its next turn. If the sapper uses the firetube as a melee weapon, it is +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Kelder
monsters.damage_resistances: Resistances bludgeoning and piercing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the kelder remains motion- less, it is indistinguishable from a normal plant.

traits.name: Mydelium Network
traits.desc: If a creature is within 40 feet of the kelder, it can use a bonus action to have its mycelium attack the creature. The creature must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or become paralyzed for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the effect on a success.

actions.name: Crushing Roots
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) blud- geoning damage.

traits.name: Enduring March
traits.desc: Ambrian offcers have advantage on saving throws against exhaustion.

traits.name: Shield Fighter
traits.desc: If an officer makes a successful attack roll, it can use its bonus action to slam the target. If the target is a Medium sized creature or smaller, it must make a DC 13 Strength saving throw. On a failure the officer can choose to move it 10 feet in a line, or cause the creature to become prone.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach  5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage or 8 (1d10 + 3) if wielded with two hands.

reactions.name: Issue Command
reactions.desc: the officer can direct an Ambrian soldier that it can see within 60 feet to focus its efforts on a single target, adding +2 damage on a single damage roll after a successful attack roll.

monsters.name: Symbaroum Monster Arach Poisoner
monsters.languages: The languages it knew before being transformed; Spider-tongue

traits.name: Chitin Armor
traits.desc: The arach’s armor class is equal to 10 plus its Dexterity modifier and its Constitution modifier.

traits.name: Pack Tactics

traits.name: Entice
traits.desc: The sheltering shadows of the tree and the pleasant warmness it emits combine to be attractive to passing creatures. A creature that has not already been attacked by the tree and is within 120 feet  of it must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or approach closer. traits.name: False Appearance

traits.desc: The brimstone oak can use a bonus action to erect a root wall. Each root wall is 10 feet high, 10 feet thick and consists of 1 to 4 10-foot wide sections. Each section is AC 18, has 50 hit points and is resistant to bludgeoning and piercing from nonmagical weapons. No root wall section can be further than 60 feet from the main body of the brimstone oak.

traits.desc: The skullbiter’s Corruption total reduces its current and maximum hit points. If its Corruption total is above 0 and the skullbiter reaches 0 hit points then it becomes unconscious, waking up after a short rest. The skullbiter does not gain Marks of Corruption when it exceeds its Corruption Threshold. Another creature can slay the skullbiter by inflicting total damage equal to or above its original, unmodi- fied maximum hit points.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The wraith can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turninside an object. If the object is a creature, that creature takes 2 (1d4) temporary Corruption.

The target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitutionsaving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes an ex- tended rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. A slain creature rises as a new wraith within 24 hours.

reactions.desc: The wraith can move up to half its speed when another creature comes within its reach without provoking an opportunity attack.
