actions.name: Grappling Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 $., one creature. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) slash- ing damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it becomes grappled (escape DC 20).

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 $., one creature. Hit: 9 (1d6 + 6) piercing damage. the creature must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute.

reactions.name: Uncanny Dodge
reactions.desc: When a creature that the raskal can see hits it with an attack, the raskal can reduce the damage by half.

traits.name: Earth Glide
traits.desc: The elemental can burrow through non- magical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the elemental doesn’t disturb the material it moves through.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target, Medium size or smaller. Hit: the target is swallowed, it is blinded and restrained; and it has total cover against attacks and other effects. The elemental can have only one target swallowed at a time. If the elemental dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting prone.

traits.name: Enlarge (Recharge 5–6)
traits.desc: The bestiaal uses its bonus action to increase in size one step, along with anything it is wearing or carrying for 1 minute. It gains 6 temporary hit points. It does an additional 1d4 damage on melee attacks while enlarged.

traits.name: Leathery Skin
traits.desc: The bestiaal’s armor class is equal to 12 plus its dexterity modifier if it is not wearing armor.

traits.name: Metamorphosis
traits.desc: The bestiaal can use a bonus action to change its body, changing its enlarge, leathery skin or claws traits out for others given on page 15.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The bestiaal makes two claws attacks.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Choose up to Three
bonus_actions.desc: Glint Carrriers get four

bonus_actions.name: Aggressive
bonus_actions.desc: The bestiaal can use its bonus action to move a distance equal to its speed towards a hostile creature it can see.

bonus_actions.name: Awareness
bonus_actions.desc: The bestiaal has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

bonus_actions.name: Blood Frenzy
bonus_actions.desc: The bestiaal has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that currently has less than its maximum hit points.

bonus_actions.name: Bite
bonus_actions.desc: Str or Dex The bestiaal makes an attack against a target within 5 feet. To hit is its proficiency bonus (2, or 3 for glint-carrier) plus the chosen ability modifier. On a hit, it does 1d8 plus chosen ability modifier in piercing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Claws
bonus_actions.desc: Str or Dex.The bestiaal makes an attack against a target within 5 feet. To hit is its proficiency bonus (2, or 3 for glint-carrier) plus the chosen ability modifier. On a hit, it does 1d8 plus chosen ability modifier in slashing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Enlarge  (Recharge 5–6)
bonus_actions.desc: The bestiaal uses its bonus action to increase in size one step, along with anything it is wearing or carrying for 1 minute. It gains temporary hit points equal to its number of Hit Dice. It does an additional 1d4 damage on melee attacks while enlarged.

bonus_actions.name: Leathery Skin
bonus_actions.desc: Dex.The bestiaal’s armor class is equal to 12 plus its Dexterity modifier.

bonus_actions.name: Reduce  (Recharge 5–6)
bonus_actions.desc: .The bestiaal uses its bonus action to reduce in size by one step, along with anything it is wearing or carrying until the beginning of its next turn. Its current and maximum hit points are reduced by its number of Hit Dice (to a minimum of 1 hit point). Its melee attack does the minimum possible damage (as if the bestiaal rolled a 1 on all damage dice).

bonus_actions.name: Wings
bonus_actions.desc: The bestiaal gains a flight speed of 30 feet.

monsters.name: Symbaroum Monster The Wily
spells: Innate Spellcasting. The wily’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 11, +3 to hit). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components.

traits.name: Corruption Sense.
traits.desc: If a creature has one or more points of permanent Corruption, the wily has advantage on Perception checks to find or notice it.

traits.name: Corruption Siphon
traits.desc: With a successful bite attack and a bonus action, the wily drains 1d4 temporary Corruption from the creature. If the creature still has temporary Corruption remaining, it gains 1 point of permanent Corruption.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The wily makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) slashing damage and 1 temporary Corruption.

monsters.damage_resistances: acid, lightning, thunder; blud- geoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Arctic Camouflage
traits.desc: The snow wraith has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

traits.name: Blood Frenzy
traits.desc: The snow wraith has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that cur- rently has less than its maximum hit points.

actions.name: Ice Breath (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 27 (4d10 + 5) cold damage on a fail- ure or half that on a success. Creatures that fail the saving throw have their speed reduced by 10 feet until the start of the snow wraith’s next turn.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 23 (4d8 + 5) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes an ex- tended rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. A slain creature rises as a new wraith within 24 hours.

reactions.name: Swipe
reactions.desc: The snow wraith can strike out with its limbs when a creature comes within reach. The crea- ture must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or take 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Hutijin
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Infernal Despair
traits.desc: Each creature within 15 feet of Hutijin that isn't a devil makes saving throws with disadvantage.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Hutijin fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Hutijin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Hutijin's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Hutijin regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Hutijin dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Hutijin makes four attacks: one with his bite, one with his claw, one with his mace, and one with his tail.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (2d6 + 8) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a 22 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned. While poisoned in this way, the target can't regain hit points, and it takes 10 (3d6) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The poisoned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (2d8 + 8) slashing damage.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (2d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (2d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: Hutijin magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

reactions.name: Fearful Voice (Recharge 5-6)
reactions.desc: In response to taking damage, Hutijin utters a dreadful word of power. Each creature within 30 feet of him that isn't a devil must succeed on a 22 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of him for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that saves against this effect is immune to Hutijin's Fearful Voice for 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Hutijin attacks once with his mace.

legendary_actions.name: Lightning Storm (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Hutijin releases lightning in a 20-foot radius. All other creatures in that area must each make a 22 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: Hutijin uses his Teleport action.

spells: Hutijin's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 22). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: alter self (can become Medium when changing his appearance), animate dead, detect magic, hold monster, invisibility (self only), lightning bolt, suggestion, wall of fire
3/day each: dispel magic
1/day each: heal, symbol (hopelessness only)

actions.desc: (Recharge 5–6). Ranged Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, range 40/80 ft., one Large or smaller creature. Hit: The creature is restrained by webbing. As an action, the restrained creature can make a DC 15 Strength check, escaping from the webbing on a success. The effect also ends if the webbing is destroyed. The webbing has AC 15, 20 hit points, vulnerability to fire damage, and immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage.

traits.name: Captivate
traits.desc: The managaal uses its bonus action and stares at a single creature with its devil-like eyes. The creature must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or become [[202202102012 5e Conditions Stunned]] for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the effect on a success.

traits.name: Dark Destiny
traits.desc: If the managaal would consume additional Corruption past the 12 points that its vessel of darkness holds, it instead vomits forth a managaal spawn and the vessel’s Corruption becomes 0.

traits.name: Thirsty
traits.desc: If the managaal has no Corruption in its vessel of darkness, it has advantage on its attacks.

traits.name: Vessel of Darkness
traits.desc: The managaal can absorb excess Corruption. The vessel can hold up to 12 points of Corruption. If a managaal begins its turn with Corruption in its vessel, it reduces its vessel Corruption by 1.

actions.name: Thorny Tongue
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage and the target loses 1d6 temporary Corruption (to a maximum of the creature’s current temporary Corruption), with the managaal gaining the same amount in its vessel of darkness. The target is [[202202102004 5e Conditions Grappled]] (escape DC 9).

reactions.name: Blood Drink
reactions.desc: If the managaal has a creature [[202202102004 5e Conditions Grappled]], it does 2 (1d4) piercing damage to it and the target loses 1 temporary Corruption (if it has temporary Corruption remaining). If so, the managaal gains 1 temporary Corruption into its vessel of darkness.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Quaggoth Thonot

traits.name: Wounded Fury
traits.desc: While it has 10 hit points or fewer, the quaggoth has advantage on attack rolls. In addition, it deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage to any target it hits with a melee attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The quaggoth makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

spells: The quaggoth's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 11). The quaggoth can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: feather fall, mage hand (the hand is invisible)
1/day each: cure wounds, enlarge/reduce, heat metal, mirror image

traits.name: Keen Sight
traits.desc: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The griffon makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Adult Black Dragon
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 21

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) acid damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a 16 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales acid in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Detect
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a 19 Dexterity saving throw or take 13 (2d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

traits.name: Haunting
traits.desc: A lostling that is inside a creature can attempt to take control of the creature. The creature must make a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or become [[20220210209 5e Conditions Possessed]] by the creature. At the end of its turn it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the haunting feature for 24 hours.

traits.name: Insubstantial
traits.desc: The lostling can pass through objects and creatures without issue.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The lostling has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the lostling’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn’t incapacitated.

actions.name: Vitality Drain
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (4d6) necrotic damage.

monsters.name: Symbaroum Monster Arch Troll
monsters.equipment: crude alchemical equipment, weak poison, weak antidote, jewelry and trinkets (1d10 thaler)

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/day)
traits.desc: If the troll fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Enthrall
traits.desc: When a creature first tries to act against the troll they must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure the creature becomes charmed by the troll until the end of its turn. A creature that succeeds at the saving throw becomes immune to the effect for 24 hours.

traits.name: Rage (6/day)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the troll can enter a rage that lasts for 1 minute. While in the rage, the troll has advantage on Strength checks and saving throws. When it makes a me- lee weapon attack it adds +6 to its damage. The creature has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing and slashing damage while in the rage. The rage ends early if the creature ends its turn without having attacked a hostile creature since its last turn or taken damage since then. It can also use a bonus action to end the rage.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The arch troll recovers 12 hit points at the start of its turn, unless it has taken acid or fire damage since its last turn.

traits.name: Tough
traits.desc: The arch troll has 1 extra hit point for each Hit Die it has.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The troll makes two claw attacks. Each grappled creature (see below) prevents the troll from making a claw attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (1d12 + 7) slashing damage.

actions.name: Grab and Squeeze
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 23). The troll can have a maximum of two creatures grappled. On subsequent rounds, it can use its action to do 20 (2d12 + 7) bludgeoning damage to a target.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (2d12 + 7) piercing damage.

actions.name: Kick
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (4d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

Legendary Actions.name: The arch troll can take 2 legendary actions, choosing from the options below
Legendary Actions.desc: Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The arch troll regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

Legendary Actions.name: Biting
Legendary Actions.desc: The arch troll makes a bite attack.

Legendary Actions.name: Stomping
Legendary Actions.desc: The arch troll makes a kick attack.

Legendary Actions.name: Squeezing (Costs 2 Actions)
Legendary Actions.desc: The arch troll squeezes all opponents it has grappled.

legendary_actions.name: The arch troll can take 2 legendary actions, choosing from the options below
legendary_actions.desc: Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The arch troll regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Biting
legendary_actions.desc: The arch troll makes a bite attack.

legendary_actions.name: Stomping
legendary_actions.desc: The arch troll makes a kick attack.

legendary_actions.name: Squeezing (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The arch troll squeezes all opponents it has grappled.

traits.name: Bestial
traits.desc: The illgoblin has disadvantage on Deception, Performance and Persuasion checks. It has advantage on Intimidation checks.

traits.name: Gravely Cold
traits.desc: The illgoblin can activate this feature with a bonus action. For 1 minute, each creature that starts its turn within 120 feet of the illgoblin must pass a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or take 6 (1d6 + 3) cold damage and lose 10 feet of its movement speed until the end of its turn.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The illgoblin’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (+6 to hit, spell save DC 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components.

traits.name: At will
traits.desc: chill touch, [[Symbaroum Spells Spirit walk]]

traits.name: 3/day each
traits.desc: [[5e spells Symbaroum Spells Black Breath]], [[darkness negative light  w]], [[sending telegram wc]]

traits.name: 1/day
traits.desc: [[5e Spells magic circle keep out or in wc Kreidekreis]]

traits.name: Pact
traits.desc: see [[Illgoblin Pact Making Powers]]

actions.name: Bone Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters: Symbaroum Monster Novice of the Order

monsters.name: Symbaroum Monster Novice of the Order

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: the adept’s spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell attack +5, save DC 13) and it knows the following spells:

traits.name: Cantrips
traits.desc: [[5e spells fire_bolt 1d10 dmg w]] (0), [[5e spells light wc]] (0), [[5e spells message 120 ft w]] (1), [[5e spells poison_spray touch 1d12 w]] (0), [[5e spells prestidigitation w]] (1), [[5e spells ray of frost 1d8 dmg slowed down w]]] (1)

traits.name: 1st-level spells
traits.desc: [[5e spells detect magic wc]] (1d4 + 1),[[5e spells magic missile 3 x 1d4 plus 1 w]](1d4 + 1), [[shield w]]] (1d4 + 1), [[5e spells sleep w]] (1)

traits.name: Rituals
traits.desc: [[5e spells alarm w 5e]]

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage

monsters.note: GM_FlohFelixAljoscha/gamemaster_rules/monsters/Symbaroum Monsters/Symbaroum Monster Novice of the Order 2.md

monsters.name: Symbaroum Monster Village Barbarian warrior
monsters.equipment: a wooden or metal beaker, wooden figurine (the clan’s spirit guardian), stone for sharpening the axe, 1d10 shillings

traits.name: Man-at-Arms
traits.desc: The village warrior’s armor class is improved by +1. It can don or doff armor in half the regular required time.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The village warrior makes two attacks with its double-axe.

actions.name: Double-axe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach  5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage.

reactions.name: Two-handed Force
reactions.desc: If the village warrior misses an attack, it can use its reaction to reroll the attack.

traits.name: Cheap Shots
traits.desc: the drunkard’s unarmed strikes do 1d6 bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Unarmed Strikes
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeon- ing damage.

reactions.name: Wild Swing
reactions.desc: If a creature comes into the drunkard’s reach it can try to make an unarmed strike with disadvantage.

monsters.name: Symbaroum Monster Barbarian Village guard
monsters.equipment: hunting traps and fishing gear, wooden figurine (the clan’s spirit guardian), 3 throwing spears, 1d10 ortegs

traits.name: Hunter’s Instinct
traits.desc: The village guard can use its bonus action to mark one creature as its chosen target. Thea first time it does damage to the target, it does +2 bonus damage. It can use its reaction when the target moves to make a ranged weapon attack.

traits.name: Trapper
traits.desc: The village guard can use its action to deploy a mechanical trap within 5 feet of its position. A creature that enters the area must make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or take 6 (1d12) bludgeoning damage. The village guard is never affected by the trap, but treats the area around the trap as difficult terrain.

actions.name: Axe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

traits.name: equipment
traits.desc: [[Item Concentrated Magic DC 15 10 Th d4]], [[Item Drone Dew DC 10  20 Th d8]], [[Item Herbal Cure DC 10 10 Th d8]], [[Spore Bombs]], [[Item Waybread DC 10 5 Th 2d6]], [[Weak Poison DC 10 1 round plus 1 d6 poison damage plus 3 10 Th d6]]

traits.name: Distract (1/day)
traits.desc: the drug peddler can use its bonus action to cause a distraction, gaining advantage on its stiletto attack this turn.

actions.name: Stiletto
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, plus 3 (1d6) poison damage. Deep impact: on a critical hit, this weapon does a total of 9 (2d4 + 4) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Symbaroum Monster frostlight

traits.name: Insubstantial
traits.desc: The frostlight can pass through objects and creatures without issue. It cannot wear or carry anything.

traits.name: Nimble
traits.desc: The frostlight’s armor class is equal to 10 plus twice its Dexterity modifier.

actions.name: Shock
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range  25 ft./100 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (4d6) lightning damage.

bonus_actions.name: Drain
bonus_actions.desc: As a bonus action the frostlight can drain the life from a creature it shares a space with. The creature takes 5 (1d10) necrotic damage and 1 (oder besser d4) temporary Corruption.

monsters.note: GM_FlohFelixAljoscha/gamemaster_rules/monsters/Symbaroum Monsters/Symbaroum Monster frostlight alt dmg resolute and d4 temp corr res save oder zwangshandlung Geisterecho 2.md

monsters: Symbaroum Monster Ravenous Willow, Young Strangler

monsters.name: Symbaroum Monster Ravenous Willow, Young Strangler
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning and piercing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the ravenous willow remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal plant.

traits.name: Mirage
traits.desc: The ravenous willow can produce an illusion to attract prey. A creature can detect the illusion by making a DC 14 Wisdom (Perception) check.

traits.name: Root Walls (3/day)
traits.desc: The ravenous willow can use a bonus action to erect a root wall. Each root wall is 10 feet high, 10 feet thick and consists of 1 to 4 10- foot wide sections. Each section is AC 18, has 50 hit points and is resistant to bludgeoning and piercing from nonmagical weapons. No root wall section can be further than 60 feet from the main body of the ravenous willow.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ravenous willow makes an attack with its vines and then with its branches.

actions.name: Entangling Vines
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (1d10 + 8) bludgeon- ing damage and, if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (Escape DC 18).

actions.name: Gnarled Branches
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (2d12 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

reactions.name: Crushing Embrace
reactions.desc: When a grappled creature attempts to escape and fails, the ravenous willow can squeeze it to do 13 (2d12) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.note: GM_FlohFelixAljoscha/gamemaster_rules/monsters/Symbaroum Monsters/Symbaroum Monster Ravenous Willow, Young Strangler CR 14.md

monsters.name: Symbaroum Monster World Serpent Wallower
monsters.damage_immunities: acid, poison, psychic; bludgeoning from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/day)
traits.desc: If the world serpent fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Life Sense
traits.desc: The world serpent has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks to detect living creatures.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The world serpent deals double damage to objects and structures.

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.desc: If the world serpent leaves a creature’s reach by burrowing it does not provoke an opportunity attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 34 (10d4 + 9) bludgeoning damage and if the target is a Huge or smaller creature it is swallowed. If the target is swallowed, it is [[202202102106 5e Conditions Blinded]] and [[202202102010 5e Conditions Restrained]]; and it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the world serpent. At the start of each of its turns, it takes 13 (2d12) acid damage.

actions.name: The world serpent can swallow any number of creatures
actions.desc: If the world serpent dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 30 feet of movement, exiting prone.

actions.name: Tail Swipe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 41 (5d12 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

legendary_actions.name: The world serpent can take 2 legendary actions, choos- ing from the options below
legendary_actions.desc: Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The world serpent regains spent leg- endary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Bite
legendary_actions.desc: The world serpent makes a bite attack.

legendary_actions.name: Tail
legendary_actions.desc: The world serpent makes a tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Earthquake (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The world serpent shivers its body, sending waves through the earthfor 80 feet. Each creature must make a DC 25 Strength saving throw, taking 10 (1d20) bludgeoning damage and becoming [[5e Conditions Prone]] on a failure. On a success, the creature takes half damage. Each structure in the area takes double damage automatically.

reactions.name: Roll Over
reactions.desc: When a Large or smallercreature comes within 5 feet, the world serpent can rotate its body to crush the creature between itself and the ground. The creature takes 20 (1d20 + 10) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.note: GM_FlohFelixAljoscha/gamemaster_rules/monsters/Symbaroum Monsters/Symbaroum Monster World Serpent Wallower CR 26.md

traits.name: Nimble
traits.desc: The glint’s armor class is equal to 10 plus twice its Dexterity modifier.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

actions.name: Infest
actions.desc: The glint tries to fly into the creature’s mouth and lodge itself in its throat. The creature must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, becoming infested on a failure. An infested creature loses control over its actions at the end of its next turn and gains the benefits of Swift (+10 ft. to each movement type) and Sturdy (+2 Hit Dice) after a long or extended rest. see [[Glint-Carrier Template]]

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The world serpent deals double damage to objects and structures.

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.desc: If the world serpent leaves a creature’s reach by burrowing it does not provoke an opportunity attack.

If the target is swallowed, it is blinded and restrained; and it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the world serpent. actions.name: Tail Swipe

legendary_actions.desc: Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The world serpent regains spent leg- endary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Tail

Each creature must make a DC 21 Strength saving throw, taking 6 (1d12) bludgeoning damage and becoming prone on a failure. On a success, the creature takes half damage. Each structure in the area takes double damage automatically.

reactions.name: Roll Over
reactions.desc: When a Medium or smaller creature comes within 5 feet, the world serpent can rotate its body to crush the creature between itself and the ground. The creature takes 15 (1d12 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Crushing Hammer
traits.desc: On a critical hit, the artisan can choose to destroy the opponent’s shield (if it has one) instead of doing extra damage. Magical shields are not destroyed but are damaged and cannot be used until repaired outside of combat.

actions.name: Long Hammer
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage or 9 (1d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage if wielded with two hands.
